original_text: And Ezra the priest brought the law before the congregation both of men and women, and all that could hear with understanding, upon the first day of the seventh month.
korean_text: 일곱째 달 초하루에 제사장 에스라가 율법책을 가지고 회중 앞 곧 남자나 여자나 알아들을 만한 모든 사람 앞에 이르러

sentences.original_text: And Ezra the priest brought the law
and all that could hear with understanding
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 깨달아 들을 수 있는 모든 사람에게

sentences.original_text: upon the first day of the seventh month
